original_title: Fuel quotas to be increased again next month: Kanchana
original_body_lines: Fuel quotas will be further increased next month after evaluation, Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara said today.
In a Twitter message, the Minister said that the fuel cargo plan and supply for the next 6 months was reviewed with the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC).

"Fuel import plans, refinery operations, refinery upgrade proposals, QR quotas, storage capacity, stock automation, agreements with fuel stations, and distribution were reviewed and discussed," he said.
